reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made with quality fabric that feels like cashmere, and appreciate its soft texture and nice weight that provides warmth without being too hot.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, soft material. Well made.
items.body: Super soft and cozy. It‚Äôs a very smooth, thicker sweater material - almost like a sweater coat. I wear this at the office almost everyday and will buy more colors. I do wish the sleeves were longer (I‚Äôm tall). Constructed with durable sewing - I‚Äôve washed and dried it twice without issue and there‚Äôs been no pilling. Love how I can throw it over anything to elevate while keeping warm. Feels more expensive than it is and is great over a collared white button down with the cuffs rolled up a bit. Read more
items.author: MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this coat.
items.body: I love this! Got it in camel color. It‚Äôs super soft. The length is great. Keeps me warm in winter but still cool enough to wear in spring and fall. Nice stretchy material. The color is just as pictured. I haven‚Äôt had any issues with it getting pulled on anything yet. Still looks brand new after a couple washes. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Quality
items.body: Especially nice quality The sweater coat is a good weight and is elegant/stunning I get compliments each time I wear it 5‚Äô4‚Äù at 120 lbs bought a medium Thought it would be oversized but it is not and I love the fit and style so I ordered black and light gray too Read more
items.author: Gringapeliroja

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: I got so many compliments on this and friends couldn‚Äôt believe it was from Amazon! the quality was great especially for the price. It fits oversized so I would recommend ordering your true size or a size down if you don‚Äôt want it too big. I ordered a small, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4 and normally a small. It‚Äôs fairly light weight but warm for night time. Read more
items.author: Taryn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish warmth
items.body: Obsessed! This looks so stylish. It is so soft, warm and comfy. I have only had this for about 5 days and have worn and washed it about 3 times. Washes well and I hang to dry. Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as pictured in length, color, and fit.
items.body: Perfect. Exactly as pictured. Nice weight, length, and flowy-ness to it. Well-made of a soft fabric. I followed the sizing chart and ordered according to my measurements and it fits just right. Since I take my comfy lounging clothes very seriously, I'll be ordering again in several colors. Definitely recommend. Read more
items.author: Island Girl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars What you see is not always what you get as time goes by
items.body: Something has happened to this brand of sweater. Used to be wonderful I have purchased seven of them and after the fourth one I noticed that they ran a little small for what I was looking for. I am 4 ft 10 in therefore the size small has always been oversized and I loved it absolutely loved the fit nice long comfortable snuggly sweater beautiful colors and since I am 110 lb for some reason will they looked very stylish with slacks and I could get away with wearing the same slacks three times a week and just change the sweater coats different colors with different accessories nice warm well-made sweaters and easy to care for. This is no longer the case as now they are running shorter and tighter so I decided to move up to a size medium and I was very satisfied for a while so I bought two more colors. However this last purchase was a size medium and I haven't grown any but the sweater is 6 in shorter than the rest of my sweaters by the same manufacturer and I just don't get it. I am very disappointed as the first sweaters had such a nice flow and looked so classy even though they were oversized this new tighter version leaves too big of a gap in front and doesn't have the drape or flow what the thickness and softness that my first seven sweaters by the same company did. I don't know what to do at this point I only had two more colors to go and that was the pink and the wine red which I was planning on wearing wish I was planning on wearing for a special occasion late March and the pink in April but I am afraid those are two sweaters I will not be purchasing if they fit like the last one which was the dark green. I am very thankful I purchased the other ones when I did. I received lots of compliments and have gotten quite a bit of wear out of them ,but all good things must come to an endüòí Read more
items.author: Chickie Smothers Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Stylish & Super Versatile ‚Äî Great Everyday Cardigan
items.body: This long‚Äësleeve maxi cardigan is exactly what I hoped for: soft, comfy, and easy to style with almost anything. It drapes beautifully and gives a nice flowy look whether I‚Äôm wearing jeans, leggings, or even a dress. The length makes it perfect for cooler weather ‚Äî it keeps me warm without feeling bulky, and the open‚Äëfront design makes it easy to throw on and go. I get compliments whenever I wear it because it adds a polished, cozy touch to simple outfits. Definitely worth picking up if you want a go-to layering piece that‚Äôs comfy, flattering, and works with a range of outfits. Read more
items.author: Michelle fadely

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Dark Khaki, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Camel Beige, Dark Green, Taupe, Jasper, Wine Red, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
